radiographic_examinations.findings: There is minimal bibasilar dependent atelectasis, mild right atrial enlargement, and diffuse coronary artery calcifications. A 1.4 cm hypodense lesion in hepatic segment 4A, numerous gallstones in the gallbladder, normal pancreas, normal size and shape adrenal glands, kidney cysts (1.8 cm on right, 1.2 cm on left), unremarkable stomach and small bowel, enlarged prostate gland, and no evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
